requirements.summary: Implement cyberpunk color scheme with deep black backgrounds and neon accent colors
acceptanceCriteria: index.css updated with cyberpunk CSS custom properties (near-black bg, neon blue/purple/green accents)
tailwind.config.js color palette reflects cyberpunk theme
Background colors changed to deep black/near-black (#0a0a0f or darker)
Primary accent color is electric blue or neon cyan
Secondary accent colors include vibrant purple and neon green
All text colors provide high contrast on dark backgrounds
Card backgrounds use dark tones (#121218 or similar) with subtle borders

file_operations.description: Update CSS custom properties to define cyberpunk color palette: near-black background (#0a0a0f), electric blue accent (#00d9ff), vibrant purple accent (#b300ff), neon green accent (#39ff14), dark card backgrounds (#121218), and high-contrast text colors (white/light gray). Remove light theme variables or set them to dark cyberpunk colors as well.

Extend the Tailwind theme to include cyberpunk colors using OKLCH format: near-black backgrounds, electric blue primary, vibrant purple and neon green accents, dark card colors, and neon border colors. Map these to Tailwind utilities for consistent usage across components.

requirements.summary: Add glowing effects to interactive elements and data cards
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons display neon glow effect on hover using box-shadow
Cards have subtle ambient glow with neon accent colors
Interactive elements (links, tabs, controls) glow on focus/hover
High-confidence signals or critical alerts have pulsing glow animation
Glow intensity varies appropriately (subtle for ambient, strong for interactive states)
CSS keyframe animations implemented for pulsing glow effects

file_operations.description: Add global CSS classes for glow effects using box-shadow with neon colors (electric blue, purple, green). Define base glow classes (.glow-ambient, .glow-hover, .glow-strong) with varying shadow spreads and blur radii. Create @keyframes animations for pulsing glow effects (.glow-pulse) that animate between low and high shadow intensity. Include hover and focus-visible pseudo-classes for interactive elements.

requirements.summary: Update typography to use tech-inspired fonts
acceptanceCriteria: tailwind.config.js configured with tech-inspired font for headings
Monospace font applied to all numerical data, prices, and technical indicators
Fonts loaded from Google Fonts or similar CDN
Typography hierarchy maintained with appropriate font weights
Headings use geometric/tech-inspired sans-serif font
Data displays (prices, percentages, volumes) use monospace font

file_operations.description: Add Google Fonts link tags in the <head> section to load tech-inspired fonts: a geometric sans-serif like Rajdhani or Orbitron for headings, and a monospace font like JetBrains Mono for numerical data. Include multiple font weights (400, 500, 600, 700) for proper hierarchy.

Configure font families in the theme extension: set 'sans' to use the tech-inspired geometric font (e.g., Rajdhani, Orbitron) with fallbacks, and set 'mono' to use the loaded monospace font (e.g., JetBrains Mono, Fira Code) with fallbacks. Ensure font families are properly quoted and include system fallbacks.

Apply font families globally: set body text to use the tech sans-serif font, and add utility classes for monospace text (.font-mono) to be used on numerical displays. Define font weight utilities for headings (font-bold) and data (font-normal or font-medium).

requirements.summary: Add smooth CSS transitions and animations to enhance interactivity
acceptanceCriteria: All interactive elements have smooth hover transitions (0.2-0.3s)
Cards and list items have entrance animations (fade-in or slide-in)
Data updates animate smoothly without jarring changes
Reduced-motion media queries implemented for accessibility
Animations perform smoothly without frame drops
Cyberpunk-style effects (scanlines, glitches, data-streams) applied tastefully to enhance theme

file_operations.description: Add global transition properties to interactive elements (buttons, links, cards) with 0.2-0.3s duration and ease-out timing. Define @keyframes for entrance animations (fadeIn, slideInUp) and cyberpunk effects (scanline, glitch, dataStream). Add @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) query to disable animations for users who prefer reduced motion. Create utility classes for common animations (.animate-fade-in, .animate-slide-in, .animate-pulse-glow).

Extend the animation configuration to include custom animations: fadeIn, slideInUp, pulseGlow, and any cyberpunk-specific effects. Define keyframes for these animations with appropriate timing functions and durations. Ensure animations are performant by using transform and opacity properties.

requirements.summary: Redesign CryptoTable component with cyberpunk styling
acceptanceCriteria: CryptoTable rows have dark backgrounds with subtle hover glow
Price values display in neon green (gains) or neon red (losses) with glow effect

file_operations.description: Apply cyberpunk styling to the CryptoTable: set dark row backgrounds with hover glow effects using the glow utility classes. Color-code price change values with neon green for positive (with glow) and neon red for negative (with glow). Style table headers with tech font and add neon border-bottom or underline accent. Enhance SignalBadge rendering to use strong neon glow. Ensure all text has high contrast against dark backgrounds. Apply monospace font to numerical columns (price, volume, market cap).

acceptanceCriteria: Card has dark background with neon-colored border glow
Entry point prominently displayed with strong neon glow effect

file_operations.description: Apply cyberpunk styling to AITradeAnalysisCard: set dark card background with neon-colored border glow (electric blue or purple). Style the entry point display with strong neon glow and large monospace font. Create gradient badges for take-profit targets using multiple neon colors (blue/purple/green gradients). Add glowing progress bar for confidence score with color-coding (green for high, yellow for medium, red for low). Apply pulsing glow animation to cards with confidence >70%. Style risk level badges with neon warning colors. Use geometric shapes (rectangles with angled corners, dividers) for visual interest. Ensure all numerical values use monospace font.

file_operations.description: If Dashboard contains a heatmap visualization, apply cyberpunk styling: use neon color gradients for blocks (green shades for positive changes, red for negative), add glowing borders that intensify on hover, implement pulsing glow animation for high volatility items (>10% change), set dark grid background with subtle neon gridlines, style blocks with geometric shapes, and add neon flash click animation using CSS transitions. If heatmap is in a separate component, note that component path for styling. Apply monospace font to percentage values displayed on blocks.

requirements.summary: Enhance mobile responsiveness for cyberpunk redesign
acceptanceCriteria: All neon glow effects display correctly on mobile devices
Touch targets meet 44x44px minimum size requirement
Glow effects optimized for mobile performance (no excessive battery drain)
Heatmap grid adapts to mobile with readable, tappable blocks
Charts scale appropriately on mobile screens
Animations maintain 60fps performance on mobile browsers
Mobile layout preserves cyberpunk aesthetic without clutter

file_operations.description: Add mobile-specific media queries (@media (max-width: 768px)) to optimize cyberpunk effects for mobile: reduce glow spread and blur radius for better performance, ensure touch targets for interactive elements (buttons, tabs, controls) meet 44x44px minimum, use will-change property sparingly to hint browsers for animation optimization, reduce or simplify complex animations that may cause frame drops. Consider reducing scanline/glitch effects on mobile for performance.

Ensure CryptoTable is responsive on mobile: hide less critical columns on small screens (e.g., volume, market cap), ensure remaining columns are readable with adequate spacing, maintain touch targets for watchlist toggle and row interactions. Preserve cyberpunk styling (neon colors, glow) while ensuring readability.

Ensure CandlestickChart scales appropriately on mobile screens: use ResponsiveContainer with appropriate aspect ratio, ensure touch interactions work smoothly, maintain readability of axes and labels on small screens, preserve cyberpunk styling (dark background, neon colors) without performance issues.

If Dashboard contains heatmap blocks, ensure they adapt to mobile: reduce block size or use single-column layout on small screens, ensure blocks remain tappable with adequate touch targets, maintain readability of labels and percentages, preserve neon glow effects without performance degradation.

Verify mobile menu (Sheet) preserves cyberpunk styling and performs smoothly on mobile devices: ensure slide-in animation is performant (60fps), neon backdrop overlay displays correctly, navigation links have adequate touch targets, mobile layout doesn't feel cluttered.
